name: Temple of Rules
description:
Reddit username: /u/Sami_ZzZ

Press F11 for fullscreen mode. Gamepad is supported. If it is hard to figure out how to progress in the game, check out the screenshots, they are should give hints.


Credits:

  • Music by Aoiroooasamusi (Creative Commons)


Controls: Use arrow keys to move. With WASD you can strafe.


Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZiBl13eFiAY
